cause.description:
Branden is constantly broke, never having enough money to buy the designer jeans, expensive shirts, or to eat out everyday. Branden needs YOUR help with this issue, so his expensive lifestyle can continue.
1. Brandens Bank Account Never Has Enough Money, This NEEDS to STOP
2. Branden Prefers Designer Jeans, Walmart Just WONT Do
3. Branden Is Constantly Spending His Hard Earned Money On These Essentials, He Needs Some Help So He Can Buy More Than Just Shampoo
cause.mission: Prevent Branden From Ever Going Broke
cause.name: Support Branden's Expensive Lifestyle
